response.original_title: Bikepacking Across Europe - Spain to Norway - One Thousand Memories
response.overview: This is a documentary of my solo cycling trip across Europe, a 5285 km journey from Spain to Norway. From heatwaves in the South to sub-zero storms in the North, from the most beautiful coastlines to majestic and at times intimidating mountain ranges, this journey had it all. I'll forever be grateful for the people I met, the hardships and challenges that pushed me to the limit, the landscapes I could scarcely believe were real, and more than anything, for the incredible feeling of being alive.
response.title: Bikepacking Across Europe - Spain to Norway - One Thousand Memories
